name: Jet Jump Tower
description:
Jet Jump Tower

Make your way up the Tower of Trials as Jet, a jetpack-equipped adventurer. Fly through challenging levels full of hazards and enemies, until you reach a jetpack power-up!

Controls:

Move Jet left and right with the left and right arrow keys.

Jump with the up arrow key.

The jetpack is controlled with the ctrl key.

Pause with the letter "P".

Gameplay:

Proceed through levels avoiding hazards. The jetpack has a limited flight time, but recharges when it is not in use. Some levels have a jet engine at the end, which increases the jetpack's fuel.

If Jet is hit by an enemy or hazard, the jetpack will begin to spark for a few seconds before recovering. Don't take another hit or the jetpack will explode and you will lose a life!
